Configuration.Name: L1=2m_L2=1p3m_central
Configuration.SetupScript: config.wavelength = 5 config.wavelength_spread = 0.1 #config.wavelength_spread = 0.064 config.det = 510 config.det_offset = 0 config.srce = 180 config.guide = 'g8' config.apx = -47 config.bs = 1 config.beamcenterx = 49.63 config.beamcenterz = 96.51 config.drive()
